name: Snail Game (lowkeydeveloper)
description:
You've lost your pet snail! He wandered into the cave and now you must go in and find them!

Controls:

Arrow Keys - Move

Up Arrow - Jump

Reach the end and find your pet snail!

Credits:

Asriel - Programming

Josh B - Documentation

Josh E - Concept Art, Leve Design, Sprite Artist (Wheel Sprite)

Geroge - Sprite Artist (Player Sprite)

Logan - Sound Design

Casey - Tilemap Artwork
